name: Regulatory Solutions
membership: None. I am now a Life Member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants in England & Wales by virtue of my professional qualification.
goal: Policy input relating to statutory audit both of Public Interest Entities and other entities subject to audit.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market
euInitiatives: Primary focus is on Amended Directive 2014/56/EU as well as accompanying Regulation 537/2014 and implementation thereof.
